alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 7:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Marion County through 800 PM EDT... At 728 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sparr, or 8 miles southwest of Citra. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor urban flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Sparr, Ocala Airport, Anthony, Reddick and Lowell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
